view.title: Dashboard
view.content: <view canvasHeight="569" canvasWidth="611" height="569" width="611" queryCondition="" backgroundAlpha="1" backgroundColor="16777215"> <module name="ViewShowModule"/> <SubViews> <chart id="id_E6AFDF3F-F6AF-FEE4-FE87-D2361071C82F" parentID="null" type="ListChart" className="ListChart"> <properties> <item updateMode="immediate" name="width" label="宽度" type="number" group="全局" isAdminEdit="true" value="400"/> <item updateMode="immediate" name="height" label="高度" type="number" group="全局" isAdminEdit="true" value="300"/> <item updateMode="immediate" name="x" label="x" type="number" group="全局" isAdminEdit="true" value="170"/> <item updateMode="immediate" name="y" label="y" type="number" group="全局" isAdminEdit="true" value="37"/> <item updateMode="immediate" name="backgroundColor" label="背景色" type="color" group="全局" isAdminEdit="false" value="16777215"/> <item updateMode="immediate" name="borderVisible" label="显示边框" type="boolean" group="全局" isAdminEdit="false" value="false"/> <item updateMode="immediate" name="borderColor" label="边框颜色" type="color" group="全局" isAdminEdit="false" value="0xB7BABC"/> <item updateMode="immediate" name="borderWeight" label="边框宽度" type="number" group="全局" isAdminEdit="false" value="1"/> <item updateMode="immediate" name="templeteName" label="样式名称" type="string" group="全局" isAdminEdit="false" value="列表01"/> <item updateMode="immediate" name="title" label="组件标题" type="string" group="全局设置" isAdminEdit="true" value="Dashboard_total"/> <item updateMode="immediate" name="titleLabel.fontFamily" label="字体" type="enum" group="标题" isAdminEdit="false" value="微软雅黑"> <dataSource sourceType="custom" labelField="value" valueField="value"> <data> <item dataType="array"> <item value="Verdana"/> <item value="Tahoma"/> <item value="Impact"/> <item value="Arial"/> <item value="微软雅黑"/> <item value="宋体"/> <item value="黑体"/> </item> </data> </dataSource> </item> <item updateMode="immediate" name="titleLabel.textAlign" label="对齐方式" type="enum" group="标题" isAdminEdit="true" value="center"> <dataSource sourceType="custom" labelField="value" valueField="value"> <data> <item dataType="array"> <item value="left"/> <item value="center"/> <item value="right"/> </item> </data> </dataSource> </item> <item name="titleLabel.fontSize" updateMode="immediate" label="字体大小" type="number" group="标题" isAdminEdit="false" value="14" addition="maximum=20;minimum=11;stepSize=1"/> <item updateMode="immediate" name="titleLabel.fontWeight" label="字体粗体" type="enum" group="标题" isAdminEdit="false" value="bold"> <dataSource sourceType="custom" labelField="value" valueField="value"> <data> <item dataType="array"> <item value="normal"/> <item value="bold"/> </item> </data> </dataSource> </item> <item updateMode="immediate" name="titleLabel.color" label="字体颜色" type="color" group="标题" isAdminEdit="false" value="0x000000"/> <item updateMode="immediate" name="titleLabel.visible" label="标题显示" type="boolean" group="标题" isAdminEdit="true" value="true"/> <item updateMode="immediate" name="titleLabel.includeInLayout" label="标题是否占用空间" type="boolean" group="标题" isAdminEdit="true" value="true"/> <item updateMode="immediate" name="isRefresh" label="是否刷新" type="boolean" group="数据" isAdminEdit="true" value="true"/> <item updateMode="immediate" name="refreshTime" label="刷新频率(分)" type="number" group="数据" isAdminEdit="true" value="1"/> <item updateMode="immediate" name="isUseExternalCiId" label="外部CI是否可用" type="boolean" group="数据" isAdminEdit="true" value="true"/> <item updateMode="immediate" name="isUseExternalDate" label="外部时间是否可用" type="boolean" group="数据" isAdminEdit="true" value="false"/> <item updateMode="immediate" name="queryInstances" label="查询的instance(","分隔)" type="string" group="数据" isAdminEdit="true" value=""/> <item updateMode="immediate" name="numberFix" label="保留小数位数" type="number" group="数据" isAdminEdit="true" value=""/> <item updateMode="immediate" name="url" label="链接视图url" type="string" group="数据" isAdminEdit="true" value=""/> <item updateMode="immediate" name="legend.switchType" label="图例图标" type="enum" group="图例" isAdminEdit="false" value="v"> <dataSource sourceType="custom" labelField="value" valueField="value"> <data> <item dataType="array"> <item value="v"/> <item value="x"/> </item> </data> </dataSource> </item> <item updateMode="immediate" name="legend.visible" label="图例显示" type="boolean" group="图例" isAdminEdit="false" value="true"/> <item updateMode="immediate" name="legend.includeInLayout" label="图例是否占用空间" type="boolean" group="图例" isAdminEdit="false" value="true"/> <item updateMode="immediate" name="legend.fontFamily" label="图例字体" type="enum" group="图例" isAdminEdit="false" value="Verdana"> <dataSource sourceType="custom" labelField="value" valueField="value"> <data> <item dataType="array"> <item value="Verdana"/> <item value="Tahoma"/> <item value="Impact"/> <item value="Arial"/> <item value="微软雅黑"/> <item value="宋体"/> <item value="黑体"/> </item> </data> </dataSource> </item> <item name="legend.fontSize" updateMode="immediate" label="图例字体大小" type="number" group="图例" isAdminEdit="false" value="12" addition="maximum=20;minimum=2;stepSize=1"/> <item updateMode="immediate" name="legend.fontWeight" label="图例字体粗体" type="enum" group="图例" isAdminEdit="false" value="normal"> <dataSource sourceType="custom" labelField="value" valueField="value"> <data> <item dataType="array"> <item value="normal"/> <item value="bold"/> </item> </data> </dataSource> </item> <item updateMode="immediate" name="legend.markerSize" label="图例图标大小" type="number" group="图例" isAdminEdit="false" value="16"/> <item updateMode="immediate" name="alertColor" label="提示色" type="alertColor" group="全局" isAdminEdit="false" value=""/> <item name="itemUrl" updateMode="immediate" label="点击每项连接地址" type="string" note="只在横轴类型是时间而且设置多维度显示是true或者横轴类型是资源时起效" group="全局" isAdminEdit="true" value=""/> <item updateMode="immediate" name="columnSet" label="列设置" type="columnSet" group="全局" isAdminEdit="false" value=""/> <item name="grid.fontSize" updateMode="immediate" label="字体大小" type="number" group="表格" isAdminEdit="false" value="12" addition="maximum=30;minimum=5;stepSize=1"/> <item updateMode="immediate" name="grid.fontWeight" label="字体粗体" type="enum" group="表格" isAdminEdit="false" value="normal"> <dataSource sourceType="custom" labelField="value" valueField="value"> <data> <item dataType="array"> <item value="normal"/> <item value="bold"/> </item> </data> </dataSource> </item> <item updateMode="immediate" name="grid.paddingBottom" label="行下边距离" type="number" group="表格" isAdminEdit="false" value=""/> <item updateMode="immediate" name="grid.paddingTop" label="行上边距离" type="number" group="表格" isAdminEdit="false" value="3"/> <item updateMode="immediate" name="gridBox.paddingLeft" label="左边距离" type="number" group="表格" isAdminEdit="false" value=""/> <item updateMode="immediate" name="gridBox.paddingRight" label="右边距离" type="number" group="表格" isAdminEdit="false" value=""/> <item updateMode="immediate" name="gridBox.paddingBottom" label="下边距离" type="number" group="表格" isAdminEdit="false" value=""/> <item updateMode="immediate" name="dynamicProperty.fontFamily" label="表格字体" type="enum" group="表格" isAdminEdit="false" value="微软雅黑"> <dataSource sourceType="custom" labelField="value" valueField="value"> <data> <item dataType="array"> <item value="Verdana"/> <item value="Tahoma"/> <item value="Impact"/> <item value="Arial"/> <item value="微软雅黑"/> <item value="宋体"/> <item value="黑体"/> </item> </data> </dataSource> </item> <item name="rowColor" updateMode="immediate" label="交替背景色" type="colorList" realType="string" group="表格" isAdminEdit="false" internalName="" internalType="" value="16777215,16316664"/> <item name="grid.headerColor" updateMode="immediate" label="标题背景色" type="colorList" realType="string" group="表格" isAdminEdit="false" internalName="" internalType="" value="15066597"/> <item updateMode="immediate" name="dynamicProperty.textAlign" label="表格对齐方式" type="enum" group="表格" isAdminEdit="false" value="left"> <dataSource sourceType="custom" labelField="value" valueField="value"> <data> <item dataType="array"> <item value="left"/> <item value="center"/> <item value="right"/> </item> </data> </dataSource> </item> <item name="dynamicProperty.fontSize" updateMode="immediate" label="表格字体大小" type="number" group="表格" isAdminEdit="false" value="12" addition="maximum=20;minimum=11;stepSize=1"/> <item updateMode="immediate" name="dynamicProperty.fontWeight" label="表格字体粗体" type="enum" group="表格" isAdminEdit="false" value="normal"> <dataSource sourceType="custom" labelField="value" valueField="value"> <data> <item dataType="array"> <item value="normal"/> <item value="bold"/> </item> </data> </dataSource> </item> <item updateMode="immediate" name="dynamicProperty.color" label="表格字体颜色" type="color" group="表格" isAdminEdit="false" value="0x000000"/> <item updateMode="immediate" name="fillNullData" label="填充数据" type="boolean" group="数据" isAdminEdit="true" value="false"/> <item updateMode="immediate" name="columnSort" label="列排序" type="boolean" group="数据" isAdminEdit="true" value="false"/> <item updateMode="immediate" name="multiDimension" label="多维度显示(时间维度时起作用)" type="boolean" group="数据" isAdminEdit="true" value="false"/> <item updateMode="immediate" name="ciLabelDisplayType" label="CI名称显示方式" type="enum" group="数据" isAdminEdit="true" value=""> <dataSource sourceType="custom" labelField="value" valueField="value"> <data> <item dataType="array"> <item value=""/> <item value="ci_instance"/> </item> </data> </dataSource> </item> <item updateMode="immediate" name="fieldLabelDisplayType" label="属性名称显示方式" type="enum" group="数据" isAdminEdit="true" value=""> <dataSource sourceType="custom" labelField="value" valueField="value"> <data> <item dataType="array"> <item value=""/> <item value="ci_instance"/> <item value="ci_instance_kpi"/> <item value="kpi"/> </item> </data> </dataSource> </item> </properties> <dataSource resourceEnable="1" kpiEnadble="1"> <filters category="ci"> <filter type="time" isReal="1" timePeriod="0" startTime="" endTime="" timeRange=""/> <filter type="ci" ciTypeId="531188453858781" ciTypeLabel="数据中心" nodeIds="37196812577392" nodeLabels="普奥云公司"/> <filter type="multiDemension" statiType="kpi" statiIndex="0"/> </filters> <displayKpiSet kpiCodes="2011,2010,2008,2009"> <displayKpi label="用户数" name="peopleCount" code="2011" unit="Amount"/> <displayKpi label="设备数量" name="equipmentCount" code="2010" unit="Amount"/> <displayKpi label="告警数量" name="alertCount" code="2008" unit="Amount"/> <displayKpi label="采集点数量" name="kpiCount" code="2009" unit="Amount"/> </displayKpiSet> <relationSet relationType="" relationDeepth="-1" relationReverse="true" relationTargetType=""/> </dataSource> </chart> </SubViews> </view>
